description: Whether you're touring in the backcountry, multi-pitching up the canyon or just biking from camp to the river, the Deloro™ Down Vest is perfect for adding a lightweight dose of core insulation to your layering kit. This highly packable vest features a weather-resistant Pertex® Quantum shell and lofty 650-fill down, and packs into its own pocket to stash in your pack or clip to your harness.
name: Mountain Hardwear Deloro Down Vest - Mens
